verses.kjv: O clap your hands, all ye people; shout unto God with the voice of triumph.
verses.ct: Everyone, clap your hands! Shout to God with cries of victory!

verses.kjv: For the LORD most high is terrible; he is a great King over all the earth.
verses.ct: The LORD Most High is awe-inspiring; he is a great King over the whole earth.

verses.kjv: He shall subdue the people under us, and the nations under our feet.
verses.ct: He brings nations under our authority and puts peoples beneath our feet.

verses.kjv: He shall choose our inheritance for us, the excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.
verses.ct: He picks out our land for us — the pride of Jacob, whom he loved. Selah.

verses.kjv: God is gone up with a shout, the LORD with the sound of a trumpet.
verses.ct: God has ascended with a shout; the LORD has risen to the blast of a trumpet.

verses.kjv: Sing praises to God, sing praises: sing praises unto our King, sing praises.
verses.ct: Sing praises to God, sing praises! Sing praises to our King, sing praises!

verses.kjv: For God is the King of all the earth: sing ye praises with understanding.
verses.ct: Because God is King over the whole earth — sing praises with understanding.

verses.kjv: God reigneth over the heathen: God sitteth upon the throne of his holiness.
verses.ct: God rules over the nations; God sits on his holy throne.

verses.kjv: The princes of the people are gathered together, even the people of the God of Abraham: for the shields of the earth belong unto God: he is greatly exalted.
verses.ct: The rulers of the nations have assembled together as the people of the God of Abraham, because the protectors of the earth belong to God. He is exalted above all.
